snippet: Veterans need work and agriculture needs farmers. Now, with the help of nonprofits that are connecting the two, those who once served in the military are producing food.
abstract: Several nonprofit charities, seeking to replace large number of retiring farmers while providing employment for American military veterans, have begun recruiting veterans for agricultural jobs.
lead_paragraph: Veterans need work and agriculture needs farmers. Now, with the help of nonprofits that are connecting the two, those who once served in the military are producing food.

headline.main: Enlisting Veterans to Remedy the Shortage of Farmers
headline.print_headline: Making a Move From Battlefields to the Farm
